data.title: Loyal Red Dragons
data.text:
Loyal Red Dragons are a group of devoted SUNY Oneonta supporters who fuel the success of our current students by providing scholarship assistance, enabling student/faculty innovative research, and supporting efforts to continue providing an accessible, inclusive, and affordable education.

Establishing a recurring gift is the easiest and most effective way to become a Loyal Red Dragon and maximize your impact on our students, all year long.

Become a loyal red dragon

Donors who make gifts of any size in two or more consecutive fiscal years (July 1 to June 30) to the SUNY Oneonta Foundation are recognized as a Loyal Red Dragon.

As a Loyal Red Dragon, you will receive special benefits every year, including:

Loyal Red Dragon updates showing the impact of your support.

Annual Summary Statementâ€”Each January, you will receive a consolidated statement of your gifts to aid in your tax preparations.

Fewer appeals.

An exclusive Loyal Red Dragon gift.

Become a Loyal Red Dragon today and ensure continued access to a meaningful education that prepares students for success in their careers and lives.
